description: This file defines a 'Model' class for managing todo items, including methods for creating, reading, updating, deleting, and counting todos, with storage hooks.

classes.name: Model
classes.description: A class that manages todo items with storage integration, providing CRUD operations and counting functionality.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new todo item with a given title and saves it to storage.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Retrieves todo items based on query: all, by ID, or matching object.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates a todo item identified by ID with new data.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a todo item by ID from storage.

methods.name: removeAll
methods.description: Removes all todo items from storage.

methods.name: getCount
methods.description: Counts active, completed, and total todos and passes stats to callback.
